industries.hierarchy: Government Administration > Space Research and Technology
industries.description: This industry includes government entities that administer and operate space flights, space research, space exploration, and space flight centers.

industries.label: Oil Extraction
industries.hierarchy: Oil, Gas, and Mining > Oil and Gas > Oil Extraction
industries.description: This industry includes entities that focus on the exploration, development, and/or the production of petroleum from wells in which the hydrocarbons will initially flow or can be produced using normal or enhanced drilling and extraction techniques or on the production of crude petroleum from surface shales or tar sands or from reservoirs in which the hydrocarbons are semisolids.

industries.label: Natural Gas Extraction
industries.hierarchy: Oil, Gas, and Mining > Oil and Gas > Natural Gas Extraction
industries.description: This industry includes entities that focus on the exploration, development, and/or the production of natural gas from wells in which the hydrocarbons will initially flow or can be produced using normal or enhanced drilling and extraction techniques or the recovery of liquid hydrocarbons from oil and gas field gases.

industries.label: Embedded Software Products
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Software Development > Embedded Software Products
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce software (or "firmware") for machines or devices that are not usually thought of as computers, ex: routers, refrigerators, display systems, washing machines, etc. such as, software for the internet of things but do not produce these devices.

industries.label: Mobile Computing Software Products
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Software Development > Mobile Computing Software Products
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce software which runs on mobile computing devices such as smartphones and tablet computers.

industries.label: Desktop Computing Software Products
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Software Development > Desktop Computing Software Products
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce software which runs on desktop or laptop computers.

industries.label: IT System Custom Software Development
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Custom Software Development
industries.description: This industry includes entities that focus on creating, modifying, testing, and supporting software to meet the needs of a particular customer.

industries.label: IT System Operations and Maintenance
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Operations and Maintenance
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manage and/or operate clients' computer systems and/or data processing facilities (on-site or remote).

industries.label: IT System Installation and Disposal
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Installation and Disposal
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide IT services related to installing and deploying new IT systems, disaster recovery services, and/or uninstalling, and disposing of no-longer-needed IT systems or components.

industries.label: IT System Training and Support
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Training and Support
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide training and technical support for users and maintainers of IT systems.

industries.label: IT System Data Services
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Data Services
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide human expertise for data collection, data annotation, data review, data normalization, and data entry and other manual or semi-automated data services.

industries.label: IT System Testing and Evaluation
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > IT System Testing and Evaluation
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide training for and evaluation of IT systems and components.

industries.label: Internet News
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Information Services > Internet Publishing > Online Audio and Video Media > Internet News
industries.description: This industry includes entities that publish and/or broadcast news content on the Internet exclusively or operate Web sites that use a search engine to generate and maintain extensive databases of news in an easily searchable format, and do not provide traditional (non-Internet) versions of the content that they publish or broadcast.

industries.label: Blogs
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Information Services >Internet Publishing > Blogs
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce content for the internet: textual or video blogs.

industries.label: Interior Design
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Design Services > Interior Design
industries.description: This industry includes entities that plan, design, and administer projects in interior spaces to meet the physical and aesthetic needs of people using them, taking into consideration building codes, health and safety regulations, traffic patterns and floor planning, mechanical and electrical needs, and interior fittings and furniture.

industries.label: Social Networking Platforms
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Social Networking Platforms
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide services and infrastructure for social networking, primarily over the internet.

industries.label: Business Intelligence Platforms
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Data Infrastructure and Analytics > Business Intelligence Platforms
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide content, data, services, and/or computer hardware for gathering or distributing information specifically about markets and business activities.

industries.label: Business Content
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Information Services > Internet Publishing > Business Content
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide news and content about markets and business activities.

industries.label: Data Security Software Products
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Software Development > Data Security Software Products
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce software to ensure security of data and computing systems.

industries.label: Mobile Gaming Apps
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Software Development > Computer Games > Mobile Gaming Apps
industries.description: This industry includes entities that produce user-facing software for gaming on mobile platforms.

industries.label: Internet Publishing
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Information Services > Internet Publishing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that publish and/or broadcast content on the Internet exclusively. They do not provide traditional (non-Internet) versions of the content they publish or broadcast.

industries.label: Media & Telecommunications
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Media and Telecommunications
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide telecommunications and related services and media production and distribution, including broadcast media, movies, sound recordings, and animation.

industries.label: Blockchain Services
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Data Infrastructure and Analytics > Blockchain Services
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide infrastructure for management of decentralized digital assets, such as cryptocurrency and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Cryptocurrency trading platforms and blockchain hosting platforms are included in this industry.

industries.label: Retail Art Dealers
industries.hierarchy: Retail > Retail Art Dealers
industries.description: This industry includes entities that retail original and limited-edition art works. Included in this industry are entities engaged in displaying works of art for retail sale in art galleries.

industries.label: Renewable Energy Power Generation
industries.hierarchy: Utilities > Electric Power Generation > Renewable Energy Power Generation
industries.description: This industry includes entities that operate electric power generation facilities that use renewable energy resources.

industries.label: Renewable Energy Equipment Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Machinery Manufacturing > Engines and Power Transmission Equipment Manufacturing > Renewable Energy Equipment Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture renewable energy machinery and equipment.
subcategories: Engines and Power Transmission Equipment Manufacturing

industries.label: Engineering Services
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Engineering Services
industries.description: This industry includes entities that apply physical laws and principles of engineering in the design, development, and utilization of machines, materials, instruments, structures, processes, and systems. Services include the provision of advice, preparation of feasibility studies, preparation of preliminary and final plans and designs, provision of technical services, inspection, testing and evaluation of engineering projects, and other related services.

industries.label: Services for Renewable Energy
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Services for Renewable Energy
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide services for renewable energy solutions, such as solar panel installation and renewable energy consulting services.

industries.label: Digital Accessibility Services
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > IT Services and IT Consulting > Digital Accessibility Services
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide services and technologies that support digital accessibility, such as digital accessibility testing, auditing and consulting services.

industries.label: Accessible Hardware Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Computers and Electronics Manufacturing > Computer Hardware Manufacturing > Accessible Hardware Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture or assemble computer accessibility hardware, such as electronic pointing devices, touch screens and adaptive keyboards.

industries.label: Accessible Architecture and Design
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Architecture and Planning > Accessible Architecture and Design
industries.description: This industry includes entities that plan and design residential, institutional, leisure, commercial, and industrial buildings and structures that can be accessed, understood and used by all people regardless of their ability, disability or impairment.

industries.label: Robot Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Machinery Manufacturing > Automation Machinery Manufacturing > Robot Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture autonomous or semi-autonomous robots.

industries.label: Robotics Engineering
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Engineering Services > Robotics Engineering
industries.description: This industry includes entities that design autonomous or semi-autonomous robots using knowledge from multiple engineering disciplines, such as computer engineering, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, bioengineering, control engineering and software engineering.

industries.label: Surveying and Mapping Services
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Engineering Services > Surveying and Mapping Services
industries.description: This industry includes entities that provide surveying and mapping services, such as cartographic, topographic and geophysical surveying and mapping services. Included in this industry are entities involved in locating and measuring subsurface resources, such as oil, gas, and minerals, and conducting surveys for engineering purposes.

industries.label: Retail Pharmacies
industries.hierarchy: Retail > Retail Health and Personal Care Products > Retail Pharmacies
industries.description: This industry includes entities that retail prescription or nonprescription drugs and medicines.
subcategories: Retail Health and Personal Care Products

industries.label: Climate Technology Product Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Climate Technology Products Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that research, develop, and produce technologies for the generation of renewable energy, alternative fuel cells, and sequestering carbon and other greenhouse gases from the atmosphere.

industries.label: Climate Data and Analytics
industries.hierarchy: Technology, Information and Media > Technology, Information and Internet > Data Infrastructure and Analytics > Climate Data and Analytics
industries.description: This industry includes entities that collect, analyze, and interpret data related to the Earthâ€™s climate. It includes data from sources such as satellites, weather stations, and ocean buoys.

industries.label: Alternative Fuel Vehicle Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Transportation Equipment Manufacturing > Motor Vehicle Manufacturing > Alternative Fuel Vehicle Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture motor vehicles powered by fuels other than gasoline or diesel, such as electricity, natural gas, propane, hydrogen, and biofuels. Electric and hybrid vehicles are included in this industry.

industries.label: Smart Meter Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Computers and Electronics Manufacturing > Measuring and Control Instrument Manufacturing > Smart Meter Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture electronic metering devices that measure and record utility usage in real-time and enable two way communication with utility providers.

industries.label: Fuel Cell Manufacturing
industries.hierarchy: Manufacturing > Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing > Electrical Equipment Manufacturing > Fuel Cell Manufacturing
industries.description: This industry includes entities that manufacture electrochemical conversion devices that convert chemical energy from fuel sources into electricity.

industries.label: Regenerative Design
industries.hierarchy: Professional Services > Design Services > Regenerative Design
industries.description: This industry includes entities that apply specialized design approaches to design buildings, products, and systems that are ecologically restorative and inherently beneficial to the environment. Entities involved in this industry utilize techniques such as biomimicry, permaculture, and green building.
